page.title: 05Main Roads near Weston
page.content:
The A43 Oxford to Northampton road skirts Weston and meets the A421 Bicester road at a round-about just south of the village. Both roads are extremely busy with local commuters and long distance traffic heading north to the M1 or south to the M40 and A34. Race meetings at Silverstone cause extra congestion at weekends.
Although there is a 40 mph speed limit on the A43 at Weston, many accidents occur and children and old people from the edges of the village feel cut off because of the difficulties of walking or cycling along the road. Car owners experience difficulty in crossing the traffic. All the villagers questioned considered the A43 dangerous and most had witnessed accidents. Residents of Weston strongly support government proposals to extend the M40 motorway.
